resources.string: Journey across the land and you will find the spirits
You! Yes, you! You must help us
Evil spirits have stolen all of our colors, leaving us only gray and this yellowish off-white shade
$$$name, please seek out the evil spirits and answer their questions, and you can restore our colors to us
Hahaha! Imagine their horror when they went to the store. Red Delicious apples have never been delicious, and now they\'re not even r-
You want to challenge me to a battle of wits? Get ready to lose!
What mineral in the soil of Mars gives it its distinctive red color?
Which European nation\'s official fan club is known as "Het Oranje Legioen" ("The Orange Legion")?
What is the world\'s most common cultivar of banana?
Well, I guess my only regret is that Miles Davis records just don\'t sound the sa-
So, you\'re the one they call $$$name? I figured you\'d be coming soon enough.
What event was celebrated for the first time on April 22, 1970?
Lapis lazuli was first mined in the 7th century in Badakhshan province in which South Asian country?
Which of the following are true about blue jeans?
Levi Strauss was born in Germany,Blue jeans were declared an essential commodity during World War II,The word denim comes from the name of a city in France

Levi Strauss was born in Germany,The first Levi Strauss jeans were sold to miners during the 1849 Gold Rush,Blue jeans were declared an essential commodity during World War II,The word denim comes from the name of a city in France
Walt Whitman\'s poem \"When Lilacs Last in the Dooryard Bloom\'d\" was written as an elegy upon the death of whom?

Well, so you\'ve come to me at last. I think this has gone too far, $$$name
Get ready to face mental annihilation
After the Great White, what type of shark causes the most human deaths each year?
Black-tipped reef shark,Whale shark,Tiger shark,Hammerhead shark
